    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    App
    Entry point for the Schema2Script application.
    DbmsType
    Represents the supported Database Management System (DBMS) types that the Schema2Script application can work with.
    JsonSchemaParser
    Parses schema definitions written in JSON format and converts them into a SchemaModel.
    MySqlGenerator
    Generates SQL DDL statements for MySQL based on a parsed SchemaModel.
    OracleGenerator
    Generates SQL DDL output for the Oracle DBMS.
    ParserFactory
    A factory class responsible for creating appropriate SchemaParser implementations based on an input schema format.
    PostgreGenerator
    Generates SQL DDL output for the PostgreSQL DBMS.
    SchemaController
    Controller class responsible for coordinating interactions between the SchemaModel (data layer) and SchemaView (presentation layer) within the Schema2Script application.
    SchemaFrame
    Main Swing-based application window for the Schema2Script tool.
    SchemaModel
    Represents an in-memory data structure describing a parsed schema.
    SchemaParser
    Defines the contract for schema parsers capable of reading external schema files and converting them into a SchemaModel.
    SchemaParsingException
    Exception thrown when a schema file cannot be parsed correctly.
    SchemaPreviewPanel
    Swing component that displays a visual preview of the parsed schema.
    SchemaSwingView
    A Swing-based implementation of the SchemaView abstraction.
    SchemaView
    Base view abstraction for displaying messages and SQL output within the Schema2Script MVC architecture.
    SqlGenerator
    Defines the contract for components capable of converting a SchemaModel into SQL DDL (Data Definition Language) statements.
    SqlGeneratorFactory
    A factory class responsible for creating the appropriate SqlGenerator implementation based on a given DbmsType.
    XmlSchemaParser
    Parses XML-based schema definition files and converts them into a SchemaModel.
